name: GitHub Actions: Node + pnpm Cache
description: Setup Node with pnpm and effective cache.

files.template:
name: CI (pnpm)

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
        with:
          version: 9
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'pnpm'
      - run: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
      - run: pnpm -s lint || echo 'no lint'
      - run: pnpm -s test || echo 'no tests'
